name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE FAN FUN ISLAND【 #ホロライブ3期生1stライブ 】 [IPeU2_BOwA8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Intro screen showing the event logo and performers, interspersed with highlights from the concert. Background music is playing.
Usada Pekora provides the opening narration over the intro screen and crowd shots, announcing the start of the live performance.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Please wait a moment until the show starts.

subtitles.original: 本日は、ホロライブファンタジー1stライブ FAN FUN ISLANDにご来場いただきまして、誠にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for coming to Hololive Fantasy 1st Live FAN FUN ISLAND today.

subtitles.original: 大変長らくお待たせいたしました。本公演はまもなく開演いたします。
subtitles.english: Thank you for waiting for so long. This performance will begin shortly.

subtitles.original: 会場の皆さんも、配信でご覧の皆さんも、一緒に盛り上がる準備はできてますかー？
subtitles.english: Is everyone at the venue and everyone watching the stream ready to get hyped together?

subtitles.original: それでは、いよいよ開演いたします。
subtitles.english: Now, the show is finally about to begin.

subtitles.original: ホロライブファンタジー1stライブ FAN FUN ISLAND、スタート！
subtitles.english: Hololive Fantasy 1st Live FAN FUN ISLAND, start!
